title: Bloomberg Markets: Carnival CEO Announces Digital Streaming
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Carnival CEO Announces Digital Streaming
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Arnold Donald\u0010Chief Executive Officer\u0010Carnival Corp \u0010Discussing earnings and the launch of OceanView, the first over the top digital streaming channel from a travel provider for completely free access on land and at sea.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
